details:
noun
- an outward appearance
= synonyms: impression
- (of a law) having legal validity
= example: (of a law) having legal validity
= synonyms: force
- an impression, especially one that is artificial or contrived
= example: an impression, especially one that is artificial or contrived
- the central meaning or theme of a speech or literary work
= synonyms: core
- a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon
= example: a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon
= synonyms: event
- a symptom caused by an illness or a drug
= example: a symptom caused by an illness or a drug
verb
- produce
= synonyms: set up, effectuate
- act so as to bring into existence
= example: act so as to bring into existence
